application

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.DatabaseManager

  • public class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The DatabaseManager class is a singleton object (only one instance allowed).
    Author:
    Eat_It(Summer 2021 Team)

      • getExecutableRecipes

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Recipe> getExecutableRecipes(User user,
                                                                      boolean execOrNot)
        This method takes in a boolean and if true returns those recipes that are executable. If boolean is false then returns the recipes are are not executable.
        Parameters:
        user - This is the user.
        execOrNot - This boolean determines whether the list is the executable recipes or not executable recipes.
        Returns:
        Returns an ObservableList containing desired recipes.

      • getMissingIngredientListForRecipe

        public java.util.ArrayList<RecipeItem> getMissingIngredientListForRecipe(User user,
                                                                         Recipe recipe)
        This method is used to get the missing ingredients needed to execute the provided recipe. The recipe's ingredient list is cross checked against the inventory list.
        Parameters:
        user - This is the user who's inventory we want to check.
        recipe - This is the recipe who's ingredient list we want to check.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of type RecipeItem.

      • updateExecutableRecipes

        public void updateExecutableRecipes(User user)
        This method changes the recipe list to update the executable attribute.
        Parameters:
        user - This is the user who's inventory and recipe ingredient list we want to cross check.

        public void printCredentials()

      • execRecipe

        public void execRecipe(User user,
                       Recipe recipe)
        This method is used to execute a given recipe. This means that the inventory list's quantities will be changed according to the quantities of the recipe's ingredient list.
        Parameters:
        user - The user.
        recipe - The recipe of the user.

      • getUserShoppingList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getUserShoppingList(User user)
        This method is used to get the shopping list of the user. This list is generated according to par amount and expiration date of ingredients
        Parameters:
        user - This is the user.
        Returns:
        Returns an array list of type Item.
